{"step_by_step_thinking": "Vitamin A is important for vision, immune system, and reproduction. Thiamin (Vitamin B1) helps the body's cells change carbohydrates into energy. Riboflavin (Vitamin B2) is needed for growth and overall good health. Vitamin C, on the other hand, is known to enhance the absorption of iron in the body.", "answer_choice": "B. Vitamin C"}
